title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.2 - Compliance with FAA and CAB rules and regulations required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.2 - Compliance with FAA and CAB rules and regulations required

State Regulations

No person shall navigate any aircraft, land aircraft
upon, fly aircraft from, or conduct any aircraft operations on or from the air
terminal otherwise than in conformity with then current Federal Aviation

Administration and National Transportation Safety Board rules and
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
